title: ADC Looking for a diamond/challenger team
body:
Here is a link to my profile for proof of what level I can play at.

http://us.battle.net/sc2/en/profile/2943010/1/FTEKpuma/

ign: whitepumah

replies.body: That's not how it works white pumah hahaha, it's two different games. Even yet, two different genres of games. You're high master in league when you hit high master in league.
Dont bother man this kid is delusional...
Still waiting to be proven wrong...

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gglbX6nu,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-12-19T21:00:09.243+0000)
>
> Still waiting to be proven wrong...

https://puu.sh/vMuVM/14c0166132.png you've been proven.
That is not proof of anything except my mmr which is 80% out of my control.
But it is a different game mate... People want a "high master" rank in LoL, not starcraft..?

The game takes more skill and has very similar mechanics to League, some units you have to control with precision and casting abilties WHILE macroing, watching the minimap, remembering timings and scouting out what they are doing. Compared to just controlling 1 unit, you get given all the info amount the enemy and apart from that it is just knowledge of the game which has been my main focus for the past 4-5 years.
Yeah it takes a lot more skill and I have only been playing it for half as long as I have been playing league. So that would put me around high master in league.
